prodNameC: 瑞達篩檢星狀病毒檢測試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
Plate: 96det. Microwell plate, 12 microwell strips in strip holder; coated with monoclonal antibodies against astroviruses
Diluent: 100mL. Sample-dilution buffer, protein-buffered NaCl solution; contains 0.1% Kathon
Wash: 100mL. Wash buffer, phosphate-buffered NaCl solution (10-fold concentrate); contains 0.1% Thimerosal
Control+: 1.8mL. Inactivated astroviruses
Conjugate: 10mL. Peroxidase-conjugated antibody in stabilized protein solution; contains 0.1% Kathon
Substrate: 10mL. Urea peroxide/TMB
Stop: 6mL. Stop reagent. 1N sulphuric acid
applicantAddr: 台北市內湖區瑞光路188巷48號8樓
efficacy: 專供體外檢驗使用，本瑞達篩檢星狀病毒檢測試劑組是運用酵素作為定量分析以確認糞便檢體中星狀病毒的存在量。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3470 呼腸孤病毒血清試劑

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: AN DER NEUEN BERGSTRABE 17, D-64297 DARMSTADT, GERMANY
